import { callAPI } from './base'; // Get user's cards

export const getMyCards = (params = '') => callAPI(`/cards/my/${params}`); // Get single card

export const getSingleCard = id => callAPI(`/cards/${id}`); // Change card's PIN

export const changePin = (id, data) => callAPI(`/cards/${id}/change-pin`, 'put', data); // Change card's limits

export const changeLimits = (id, data) => callAPI(`/cards/${id}/change-limits`, 'put', data);
